title: Bug 18705 - Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The current description does not provide enough details to understand the issue clearly.
OB: The software exhibits excessive flashing or flickering.
EB: The expected behavior is for only the bottom edge of the outermost frames to be repainted.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
- Open the Control Example.
- Perform specific actions that cause flashing or flickering. More detailed steps are required to understand the issue.
